title: Hi, I'm Brian Darakdjian
description: Argentinean in Mallorca, Spain. Specialized in the development of web applications with new technologies.
flydevs_description: I specialized in frontend development with a focus on ReactJS, Tailwind, CSS, SASS, Redux and TypeScript. Excelling at creating dynamic interfaces, attractive designs and efficient application state management. My commitment to quality and continuous improvement has been key in the success of projects. Ready for new challenges and continuous growth!

Publifer_description: Publifer is my most recent project as a freelancer, where I chose to use modern technologies like React, TypeScript, and Tailwind to build a dynamic and efficient website. One of the key features was the integration of EmailJS, enabling automated management of budget requests and the contact form, enhancing the user experience and streamlining client communication.
